info.name: Family Meal Mate API
info.description:
This Postman collection provides example requests for the Family Meal Mate backend API.

The API supports managing households, family members, recipes, weekly meal plans, and automatically generated shopping lists.

#### **Authentication: register & login**

- Use register to create a new user
    
- Use login to authenticate
    

After successful login:

- The returned JWT token is automatically stored in the {{token}} variable
    
- The token is automatically applied to all requests requiring authorization
    
- You do not need to manually copy the token into headers
    
- All secured endpoints use: Authorization: Bearer {{token}}
    

This collection expects a Postman environment with at least:

- baseUrl
    
- token
    

**Import the provided environment file or create it manually.**

#### **Master Data**

The MasterData controller provides read-only reference data used throughout the application.

Currently loaded from CSV during application startup:

- ingredients
    
- tags
    

Defined in enums:

- Meal Types
    
- Measurements
    

#### **Household & members**

- Add additional family members
    
- Query existing members
    

#### **Recipes**

- Create new recipes
    
- Fetch existing recipes
    

#### **Meal Plans**

All households come with two predefined Meal Plan for the CURRENT and NEXT week. Users can:

- Edit meal plans by assigning recipes to specific days
    
- Mind the version field when updating
    
- Turn meal plans into templates to reuse later
    

#### **Shopping Lists**

- Generate shopping lists from meal plans
    
- Edit shopping lists
    
- Mind the version field when updating

exec: // Automatically save JWT to environment variable after login

item.name: Add Meal Plan to Shopping List
